resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

string.name: desc
string.p: We are looking for 10 PHP Developers (for both senior and junior position), who is expected to be able to perform all aspects of the development and release cycle, including front-end, back-end, database and system development. You must be able to work well independently or within a small team. Main duties:

ul.li: Understand and translate business requirements into advanced technical solutions.
Provide work estimation in points or hours - Participate in designing, developing and implementing project.
Implement web applications in using modern php web frameworks & cms framework
Report on progress and time spent

string.p: Tech is a young startup focusing on web development with emerging technologies, providing a lot of opportunities to learn new things. We aim for a friendly and flexible working environment, which could best assist developers to work effectively. Other than that, staff are offered with many benefits:
